name: Sandra LÃ³pez
title: Data Analyst
summary: Data analyst transforming complex datasets into clear, actionable insights across SQL, Python, and modern BI stacks.

projects.name: Feedback Sentiment Analysis and Clustering
projects.description: Analyzed 42,000+ OLIST customer reviews with Python + Power BI to surface satisfaction drivers and automate insights.
highlights: Translated 42k+ Portuguese reviews for unified analysis
Identified delivery as the top pain point (60%+ of negative feedback)
Built clustering pipeline to summarize unstructured feedback

projects.name: Global Box Office Insights
projects.description: Power BI dashboards covering 50+ movies to highlight genre, studio, and regional revenue performance.
highlights: Interactive views for revenue by genre, studio, and era
Surfaced market factors that drive box-office success

projects.name: Interim Project - Adventure Works
projects.description: SQL + Python deep dive on Adventure Works 2019 data to connect HR metrics, store traits, and revenue outcomes.
highlights: Explained the link between market size, workforce metrics, and revenue
Flagged manual labor teams as highest sick-leave drivers
Showed that store tenure/size have weak correlation with revenue
